1.name: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
1.description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

2.name: Frankenstein
2.description: An obsessed scientist assembles a living being from parts of exhumed corpses.

3.name: Dracula
3.description: The ancient vampire Count Dracula arrives in England and begins to prey upon the virtuous young Mina.

4.name: City Lights
4.description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

5.name: Five Star Final
5.description: The City Editor of a sleazy tabloid goes against his own journalistic ethics to resurrect a twenty year old murder case... with tragic results.

6.name: Little Caesar
6.description: A small-time criminal moves to a big city to seek bigger fortune.

7.name: The Front Page
7.description: An investigative reporter sees an opportunity for the story of a lifetime when an accused murderer escapes hanging.

8.name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
8.description: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

9.name: The Public Enemy
9.description: A young hoodlum rises up through the ranks of the Chicago underworld, even as a gangster's accidental death threatens to spark a bloody mob war.

10.name: Cimarron
10.description: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

11.name: Sullivan's Travels
11.description: A director of escapist films goes on the road as a hobo to learn about life, which gives him a rude awakening.

12.name: The Sin of Madelon Claudet
12.description: Out of jail for a crime she did not commit, Madelon turns to prostitution and thievery to send her illegitimate son to medical school.

13.name: Tabu: A Story of the South Seas
13.description: On the South Pacific island of Bora Bora, a young couple's love is threatened when the tribal chief declares the girl a sacred virgin.

14.name: Street Scene
14.description: Twenty-four hours elapse on the stoop of a Hell's Kitchen tenement as a microcosm of the American melting pot interacts with each other during a summer heatwave.

15.name: The Painted Desert
15.description: Two men find an abandoned baby and fight over the ownership of the child resulting in lifelong rivalry.

16.name: A Free Soul
16.description: An alcoholic lawyer who successfully defended a notorious gambler on a murder charge objects when his free-spirited daughter becomes romantically involved with him.

17.name: Mata Hari
17.description: A semi-fictionalized account of the life of Mata Hari, an exotic dancer who was accused of spying for Germany during World War I.

18.name: The Maltese Falcon
18.description: A lovely dame with dangerous lies employs the services of a private detective, who is quickly caught up in the mystery and intrigue of a statuette known as the Maltese Falcon.

19.name: The Secret 6
19.description: After rising bootlegger Slaughterhouse Scorpio eliminates his gangland competition, two reporters and a cabal of six businessmen work to expose him.

20.name: Monkey Business
20.description: On a transatlantic crossing, The Marx Brothers get up to their usual antics and manage to annoy just about everyone on board the ship.

21.name: The Champ
21.description: An alcoholic ex-boxer struggles to provide a good living for his son.

22.name: Arrowsmith
22.description: A medical researcher is sent to a plague outbreak, where he has to decide priorities for the use of a vaccine.

23.name: The Black Camel
23.description: The unsolved murder of a Hollywood actor several years earlier and an enigmatic psychic are the keys to help Charlie solve the Honolulu stabbing death of a beautiful actress.

24.name: Rich and Strange
24.description: Believing that an unexpected inheritance will bring them happiness, a married couple instead finds their relationship strained to the breaking point.

25.name: Drácula
25.description: Centuries-old vampire Dracula preys upon the innocent Eva and her friends.

26.name: Dishonored
26.description: The Austrian Secret Service sends its most seductive agent to spy on the Russians.

27.name: Platinum Blonde
27.description: A young woman from a very rich family impulsively marries a reporter, but each assumes the other is the one whose lifestyle must change.

28.name: Svengali
28.description: Through hypnotism and telepathic mind control, a sinister music maestro controls the singing voice, but not the heart, of the woman he loves.

29.name: The Skin Game
29.description: An old traditional family and a modern family battle over land in a small English village and almost destroy each other.

30.name: Taxi
30.description: Independent cab drivers struggling against a taxi company consortium find a leader in Matt Nolan.

31.name: Mädchen in Uniform
31.description: At an all-girls boarding school, Manuela falls in love with a teacher, to terrific consequences.

32.name: Pardon Us
32.description: Two guys end up in prison after attempting to sell beer to a policeman during Prohibition.

33.name: The Bad Sister
33.description: Marianne falls in love with a con artist who has a hidden agenda.

34.name: Bad Girl
34.description: A man and woman, skeptical about romance, nonetheless fall in love and are wed, but their lack of confidence in the opposite sex haunts their marriage.

35.name: Night Nurse
35.description: A nurse enlists the help of a petty criminal to foil a sinister plot to murder two children.

36.name: À nous la liberté
36.description: Seeking better life, two convicts escape from prison.

37.name: Possessed
37.description: An ambitious factory girl meets a handsome, wealthy lawyer, but he's interested in her as a mistress, not a wife.

38.name: Limite
38.description: Three people sail aimlessly while remembering their past.

39.name: La chienne
39.description: A woman and her pimp exploit a painter for money.

40.name: Blonde Crazy
40.description: The adventures of an egoistic con man and his glamorous accomplice.

41.name: Die 3 Groschen-Oper
41.description: In London at the turn of the century, the bandit Mack the Knife marries Polly without the knowledge of her father, Peachum, the 'king of the beggars'.

42.name: Waterloo Bridge
42.description: A prostitute's self-loathing makes her reluctant to marry an idealistic soldier during World War I.

43.name: Safe in Hell
43.description: After accidentally killing the man who raped her and forced her into prostitution, a New Orleans woman flees to a Caribbean island. While she awaits her fiancé, the vicious local police chief sets his sights on her.

44.name: Susan Lenox (Her Fall and Rise)
44.description: Fleeing her cruel uncle and an arranged marriage Susan Lenox falls in love with a kind stranger but circumstances force her to become a woman of easy virtue.

45.name: Trader Horn
45.description: Two white traders in the darkest Africa of the 1870s find a missionary's daughter, who was captured as a child by a savage tribe and now worshiped as a goddess.

46.name: Die andere Seite
46.description: In WW1, Captain Stanhope is the commander of a British company fighting against the Germans. The young Lieutenant Raleigh admires the older man who he knows from the prewar days. While ...                See full summary »

47.name: Ten Cents a Dance
47.description: Men pay a dime to dance with Barbara and her fellow taxi dancers. She marries Eddie and plans to quit dancing. Before she does, she meets a handsome and rich gentleman.

48.name: The Easiest Way
48.description: Growing up in a poor working-class family, Laura decides not to marry the boy-next-door and instead accepts wealthy, older Will Brockton's invitation to move in with him. After falling in ...                See full summary »

49.name: Skippy
49.description: Skippy, the mischievous son of a wealthy doctor, meets Sooky in poverty-ridden Shantytown, and together they try to save Sooky's pet from a cruel dogcatcher.

50.name: An American Tragedy
50.description: A poor factory worker, employed by a wealthy uncle, falls in love with a beautiful heiress but his happiness and promising future are jeopardized by a previous affair with a coworker he impregnated.
